pullrequest.title: Use UTC with 'Z' as time format instead of tzid and add ms x propreties
pullrequest.body: closes #969 Testen in: - [x] Google Calender - [x] Microsoft outlook 2013 - [x] Microsoft office 365 - [x] Mozilla Thunderbird - [x] Apple iCloud Calender see others https://zapier.com/blog/best-calendar-apps/

pullrequest.title: Use npm registry instead of nexus from synyx
Use comment date for application cancel requested state of application
Log oidc logging events
Add application forwards into comments
Improve height of datepicker months container to show last row
Consider 'de-XX' locales for date-fns translations additionally to 'de'
Enable calendar interaction for past days
Add navigate dependency to overtime overview
rerender calendar when locale has changed

pullrequest.title: Fix wrong company calendar url generation

Allow user with boss role to access /api/absences
Fix exception handling
Prepare deployment for 3.0.0
Fix working time default behaviour
Fix to early deleted mail configuration
Fix logging of user data on google calendar event

pullrequest.title: Allow user to get their own data via the api
pullrequest.body: fixes #824 I do not think that this is the best solution, because we create more database interactions with every call to the api. But we document, with the tests, where we need it and it works for now. A better solution could be to have a own UVPrinciple with the id given for every security provider we have.
